# PCoA (all WWTPs)
```{r PCOA_colored_all}
results_dir <- "results_20220726_divmean"
wwtp_results <- list.dirs(results_dir, full.names = TRUE, recursive = FALSE)

plots <- lapply(
  wwtp_results,
  function(wwtp) {
    plot <- wwtp %>%
      combine_abund(cluster_type = "abund") %>%
      amp_ordinate(
        type = "pcoa",
        distmeasure = "bray",
        transform = "none",
        sample_color_by = "split_dataset",
        sample_trajectory = "Date"
      ) +
        scale_color_manual(
          values = c("grey80", RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(3, "Set2")[c(1:3)])
        ) +
        theme(legend.title = element_blank())
    print(plot)
    return(plot)
  }
)
names(plots) <- basename(wwtp_results)

```

## Time Series examples
```{r timeseries}
AAE_long <- amp_export_long(
  AAE,
  tax_levels = "OTU",
  metadata_vars = c("Date", "split_dataset")
)

ASV1 <- AAE_long[grepl("^ASV1;", OTU)]
ASV2 <- AAE_long[grepl("^ASV2;", OTU)]
ASV3 <- AAE_long[grepl("^ASV3;", OTU)]

plot_timeseries <- function(
  data,
  filename = paste0(deparse(substitute(data)), "_timeseries.png"),
  save = TRUE
) {
  plot <- ggplot(
  data,
  aes(
    x = Date,
    y = count,
    color = split_dataset
  )
) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  scale_color_manual(
    values = c("grey10", RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(6, "Paired")[c(4, 6)])
  ) +
  scale_color_manual(
    values = c("grey10", RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(6, "Paired")[c(4, 6)])
  ) +
  scale_x_date(
    date_breaks = "3 months",
    date_labels =  "%Y %b"
  ) +
  theme(
    legend.title = element_blank(),
    axis.title = element_blank(),
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1, vjust = 0.5)
  )

  if(isTRUE(save)) {
    ggsave(
      plot,
      file = file.path(results_dir, filename),
      width = 14,
      height = 8
    )
  }
}
```

```{r fivenum_BC_ASV}
runs <- list.files(
  results_batch_dir,
  pattern = "^results_.*",
  full.names = TRUE
)

d_list <- lapply(runs, read_results)
names(d_list) <- runs
combined <- rbindlist(
  d_list,
  idcol = "results_folder",
  fill = TRUE
)[
  !is.na(cluster_type) & value > 0
]
combined[cluster_type == "Single ASV" & error_metric == "Bray Curtis", fivenum(value)]
```

```{r fivenum_reads}
#five number statistics of sum of reads per data set
list.dirs(
  "results_20220726_divmean",
  full.names = TRUE,
  recursive = FALSE
) %>%
  lapply(function(dataset) {
    abund <- fread(
      file.path(dataset, "data_reformatted", "abundances.csv"),
      drop = 1
    )
    fivenum(rowSums(abund))
  })
```
